item.title: Xshell_link_ubantu
item.description: 1.check the firewall sudo ufw status 2.close the firewall sudo ufw disable 3.open 22 port sudo ufw allow 22 4.install shh install apt-get install openssh-server

item.title: MachineLearing_1
item.description: my understant from Andrew Ng’s vedio supervised learning means training data across some given strutures and unsupervised learning means training data and find some existed strutures to adapt itself.

item.title: The_create_of_hugo_blog
item.description: Let me remind the all process of create the ‘easy’ hugo blog. 1.install hugo windows x64 https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases config the envirnment hugo path 2.sign up github 3.in cmd hugo new site xxx (../..) 4.choose one theme you like in https://themes.gohugo.io/ 5.and copy the theme’s github download link 6.int cmd git clone xxxx(the link of theme you copyed ) hugo new post/xxx.md(produce the new article) 7.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: hi guys: very happy that you can find here.and there may have something interesting that you desire to know.

item.title: Résumé
item.description: Markdown -> PDF, HTML, and more http://github.com/mwhite/resume Interests Creating beautiful resumés from simple Markdown documents Work Experience Word Processor (Redmond, WA) Junior Resumé Maker, 2006 - 2007 Intermingled presentation and content Styling was a pain, so either didn’t do it or found a half-decent template and didn’t mess with it \LaTeX\ + pdflatex Senior Resumé Maker, 2008 - 2010 Edited verbose \LaTeX\ documents in a text editor Mixed content and presentation to achieve pixel-perfection Installed and configured the unusual TeX setups required by the best-looking \LaTeX\ resumés LinkedIn, StackOverflow Careers, vizualize.
